title: (x) Rough brush script on jersey - Brush Stroke Fast {Mike F}
content:
Once thought to be Brush Stroke Fast and now Edo.... any guesses?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [original.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100913061743/http:/typophile.com/files/original.jpg) | 840.76 KB |
author: Jeremy9107

comments.content: This is, again, your original posted image - which IS Brush Stroke Fast. Yes, it looks a bit different. It's been manually condensed and skewed.

Mike, all do respect cause I know you have been doing this far longer than I have. But I just don't see the likeness. I have put the original font and the Brush Stroke Fast together in this image. To me they are quite different.

Jeremy

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100913061743im_/http:/typophile.com/files/together_6381.jpg)

The image you have labeled Brush Stroke Fast here is actually the (yes!) very different [Edo](http://web.archive.org/web/20100913061743/http:/www.dafont.com/edo.font?nb_ppp=50&text=PAIN+IS+WEAKNESS). What you have labeled Mystery Font is, again, [Brush Stroke Fast](http://web.archive.org/web/20100913061743/http:/hometown.aol.com/rps82/Fonts/brshskfst.html).

If this isn't clear to you yet, well ... I give up, Jeremy.

Jeremy, I think it is quite safe to trust Mike's judgement. He's one of our very top people here; he knows his fonts. To tell you the truth, I only do routine checks whenever I credit one of his identifications because he's always spot on.
